channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.3.2
item.description:
• PostgreSQL 10.11 with PostGIS 2.4.8
  • PostgreSQL 11.6 with PostGIS 2.5.3
  • PostgreSQL 12.1 with PostGIS 3.0.0

To save bandwidth, this update only includes bugfix updates for PostgreSQL server versions you already have installed. You can download other versions of PostgreSQL on our website: postgresapp.com/downloads.html
